Karl,

Thank you very much for the link.  I just finished reading the competition details in the supplied
PDF (http://jetty.mortbay.org/jetty/index.html).

This is a fascinating problem domain.  I am looking forward to seeing some "animations" of the
resulting competitions.

And it also seems like a great place to try out some GA kinds of solutions.  I am not sure how
NEAT could be used here, though.  I think it might be a fun conversation to start.  Who has some
ideas about how one might use NEAT as part of the solution software set?  Any ideas?


Jim

> the DATES link.  You have to finish it over this

> Perhaps there are some people who have been working on
> very similar problems and hence are ready to go.
